name: Grow Animals
description:
Have you ever wonder how are animals made ? Do you want to grow an animal by yourself and then raise it ? Well it all starts from a very first cell !
Experience the most life-changing journey. The creation of life itself.
Most of you must have already owned amazing pets, but we give you an opportunity to discover how animals develop in their mother’s womb.
LEARN WHILE PLAYING
Witness the development of baby animal from the very first single cell and follow every stage of your animals’s growth through our satisfying merge mechanic.
Raise your animal and collect many other cool animal and make them your favorite pet.
The FUN thing is, you can actually create your own cell !!! You can can create a random animal’s cell and choose your animals’s traits. It’s must be so excited to discover which animal you made !
Are you ready to be the best owner ? Let’s start this incredible adventure !
